ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Are we not going to die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Another will say:)"Is it true, we are not going to die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So, are we not going to die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will ask his companion, "Did you not say that there would only be one death
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So are we never to die?” (The people of Paradise will ask the angels, with delight, after the announcement of everlasting life.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Are we then not to die (any more)"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is it then that we are not going to die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do we then not die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Are we then not to die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he will say [to his blessed companions], "Are we not going to die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Are we not then to die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Is it [true] that we shall not die [anymore],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is it (the case) that we shall not die,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah informs about that true believer that he said): "Are we then not to die (any more)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What then, shall we not die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then, are we not to die
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then he heard a crier saying: "0 people of Paradise death is slain and from now on there is no death". Upon which he will say to his brothers: (Are we then not to die) after the slaying of death
